question: 桑畑
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>mulberry</kanji> <kanji>field</kanji> is a <vocabulary>mulberry field</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>mulberry plantation</vocabulary>. This is more like a commercial / organized mulberry growing operation, so not some random field of mulberries.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading comes from <ja>桑</ja> (kanji reading) and the vocab word <ja>畑</ja>. Watch out for the rendaku.
